thread.title: Thursday’s Travel News and Tips
thread.title_full: Thursday’s Travel News and Tips - The New York Times

author: Elaine Glusac
title: Thursday’s Travel News and Tips
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes consumer news, deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
UNESCO ADDS HERITAGE SITES
Unesco’s World Heritage Committee ended its annual meeting Wednesday in Bonn, Germany, after inducting 24 new sites to its World Heritage List. The list represents a range of natural and cultural sites that share “outstanding universal value,” according to Unesco’s criteria for selection.
The 2015 inductees range from the Blue and John Crow Mountains of Jamaica, rugged areas that were havens to indigenous Taino and escaped slaves during the island’s colonial period, to the vineyards, hillsides and cellars of the Champagne region of France, prehistoric rock art in the Hail Region of Saudi Arabia and the Greek and Roman ruins of Ephesus in Turkey.
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
